'''Vitalized Dragontooth''' is a [[Quest Item]] created from [[Strange Tooth]]. It is first used in the {{Quest|The Festering Fang}}. After the quest, it can be used to [[Forging|forge]] the [[Dragonspine Spear]].

==Craft Usage==
{{Craft Usage}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A Dragontooth that has absorbed vitality and now exudes a warmth that makes one uneasy. Once upon a time, a [[Durin|dragon]] fell to ruin in a silver valley, painting the bone-white snow an ominous crimson. This crimson symbolizes the might of this dragon. This Dragontooth wrapped in that crimson may yet be forged into a deadly weapon...|[[Archive]]}}

==Notes==
* Only 999 Vitalized Dragontooth can be held in the player's [[Inventory]].
** Using [[Strange Tooth]] at the Core when the limit has been reached will consume the Strange Tooth, but not provide additional Vitalized Dragontooth.
